mapper.insert: insert into faq(faq_id, question, answer, faq_category, created_date, modified_date) values(faq_seq.nextval,#{question},#{answer},#{faq_category},sysdate,sysdate)
mapper.update: update faq set question = #{question}, answer = #{answer}, faq_category = #{faq_category}, modified_date = sysdate where faq_id = #{faq_id}
